Countryswing

Quite simple rhythm. I'm not big on country, but this does seem to fit with "Singing The Blues".

  • CountrySwing
  • CountrySwingSus
  • CountrySwing1
  • CountrySwing1Sus
  • CountrySwing2
  • CountrySwing2Sus

  • CountrySwingEnd

CountrySwing

Marty Robbins might like this. (4)
Bass FingeredBass
Chord NylonGuitar
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Snare SnareDrum2
Walk FingeredBass

CountrySwingSus

Adds a sustained fiddle to the hoedown. (4)
Bass FingeredBass
Chord NylonGuitar
Chord-Sus Fiddle
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Snare SnareDrum2
Walk FingeredBass

CountrySwingEnd

Simple ending. Hits on each beat on bar 1, beats 1 and 3 on bar 2. (2)

Chord NylonGuitar
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
